doc:
Guy Hedlund https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guy_Hedlund 0 Guy Elmer Hedlund (August 21, 1884 – December 29, 1964) was an American actor of the silent era. He appeared in 120 films between 1906 and 1947. Born in Connecticut, Hedlund died in Culver City in a road accident. Hedlund directed the 1920 industrial film The Making of an American. Guy_Elmer_Hedlund ( August_21_,_1884 – December_29_,_1964 ) was an_American_actor of the_silent_era . He appeared in 120_films between 1906_and_1947 . Born in Connecticut , Hedlund died in Culver_City in a_road_accident . Hedlund directed the_1920_industrial_film The_Making of an_American .
